Text: If ever an album needed a remix/remaster for CD, it's "Pump," as this post reminds us (no fault of the poster!). It's maybe the greatest collection of Aerosmith songs, but the drums sound like they're being played down the hallway, and the overall sound on the CD version is so shrill that most songs are actually unpleasant to listen to. Don't know if the vinyl version is any better.
